name: places/ChIJyxHjEydZwokR7BqoFUYWtNo

displayName.text: Nishant Sondhi Real Estate | The Sondhi Team at Compass

formattedAddress: 225 Cherry St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 225 Cherry St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: Nishant is the most helpful, responsible, proactive, and trustworthy agent I have worked with. During the process of buying my first home, he educated me on every pertinent topic and answered every question I had. He made this scary process feel easy and seamless. Nishant was always on top of listings and sent me options as soon as they hit the market. He really took all the stress of the process upon himself and helped us figure out the best decisions for us. He streamlined this process and really listened to what I wanted and found me my dream home. I feel really lucky that he is a main part in this special memory of buying my first house and I cannot rave about him enough! Nishant, you are fantastic and I am forever grateful for your help.

originalText.text: Nishant provided superb guidance and insight into the Manhattan real estate market. I had specific requirements and quite a short timeframe and working with Nishant made buying the perfect apartment a stress free experience. He was able to explain the entire process, show us many great options, help us narrow it down, and guide us through closing the deal. Since this was my first time going through this process, I was not always sure what to expect or what the right questions to ask were, but Nishant proactively provided all the information I needed and pointed out specific pros/cons that I would not have otherwise known. From start to finish, Nishant dedicated a huge amount of time into making sure everything went smoothly, and his input was always informed, practical, and tailored to our needs. I am incredibly grateful for all the work Nishant put in and I cannot recommend enough!

originalText.text: Nishant was our agent on a recent Manhattan condo purchase. He fulfilled his role perfectly, and more! We couldn't be more happy with the service and advice from Nishant. We started of with a unique set of requirements that had us look at wide ranging set of neighborhoods in the city - from upper west side, to Chelsea to Midtown. Nishant  understood our requirements well and offered sage advice to narrow down the choices, without ever trying to impose or unnecessarily direct us in a direction that would not have suited us. Once we had a unit under contract, Nishant was very helpful in negotiating the best deal and a quick process with the condo board. His patience, active listening and a great service attitude resulted in a stress free experience for us - a rarity in Manhattan real estate transaction! With Nishant's help we were able to select and close on our apartment within a very quick time frame and our budget.

originalText.text: Nishant is extremely knowledgeable about the Manhattan market and his advise has been very valuable. He arranged for viewings seamlessly and provided all the information before the viewing. Our transaction closed very quickly and efficiently as Nishant has great resources that help out at every step. I highly recommend Nishant.

originalText.text: Nishant has been incredibly helpful and invaluable throughout my home buying process. My family and I couldn’t have done it without him. The entire process took unusually long (about nine months - from offer to closing) due to unforeseen issues/obstacles from the seller’s side but Nishant was phenomenal from start to finish. He went above and beyond and was great at keeping us updated about where we were in the process. He remained optimistic even when there seemed to be no end in sight. Since this is our first home, we were a little overwhelmed overall but with Nishant’s guidance and expertise the process went as smoothly as possible regardless of the delays on the seller’s side. Nishant was always available to answer any questions and I am very grateful for everything he’s done for me and my family. I will be using his services again in the future and I highly recommend him to anyone!
